intro: Stolzia oligantha, commonly known as the narrow-leaved stolzia, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. The plant is characterized by its slender, branching stems and small, delicate flowers that range in color from white to pale pink. Its leaves are narrow and slightly hairy, contributing to its distinctive appearance. Stolzia oligantha typically grows in rocky or sandy soils and thrives in full sun, making it a hardy and resilient plant.
